text: Beyond 5 stars—this was a whole new experience! The flavors and the freshness. If you haven’t tried this place yet, give it a try! Worth it

FANTASTIC experience, top notch food and taste. You can taste how unique the food, taste and culinary experience it is. I have never eaten similar Korean food and this is really too notch. The chef was very attentive, opting to change courses based on allergies and preference. Check the photos and you’ll know what I mean

Finally manage to get a reservation here after waiting for awhile to try the Summer menu. Excellent authentic korean food with detailed explanation! Burst of different flavours, love every dish especially the makgeolli bread,
Sutbul Neobiani, Porridge (comfort food for sure!!) & Panna Cotta. Cosy atmosphere. Will definitely be back again to try the other seasonal menus in future! Thank you Beok team for taking great care of us!!

This Korean fine dining restaurant exceeded all expectations, delivering a symphony of flavors, impeccable service, and an ambiance that radiates sophistication.

The ambiance strikes a perfect balance between modern elegance and traditional Korean charm. Soft lighting, tasteful decor, and subtle Korean motifs create an inviting and intimate atmosphere. The staff greeted us warmly and remained attentive throughout our meal, enhancing our overall dining experience

Beok is a culinary journey through Korea's rich gastronomic heritage. Each dish is meticulously crafted, showcasing a perfect harmony of flavors and textures. The menu including the delicate outside skirt and pork shoulder (Anchang＆Neobiani) and the perfectly octopus salad (Octopus Naengchae). Both were executed to perfection, setting a high bar for the meal.

Beok also boasts an impressive beverage menu, featuring a curated selection of Korean rice wines and wines. The sommelier was knowledgeable and provided excellent recommendations that perfectly paired with our meal.

Overall, Beok offers a dining experience that is nothing short of spectacular. The combination of exquisite food, attentive service, and a refined atmosphere makes it a must-visit for anyone seeking to explore the heights of Korean cuisine. I highly recommend this restaurant to anyone looking to indulge in a memorable fine dining experience.

A very unique korean home dining experience  which showcases unique korean dishes that are not usually found in korean restaurants. The hosts were super friendly and explained passionately about their concept and food. I enjoyed every single course, especially our Fish Jjim which is summer fish wrapped in steamed cabbage and served with a dipping sauce.
